summary: This file is a main SCSS stylesheet that includes Tailwind CSS directives and defines custom CSS variables and styles for the project.
functionality: The file provides global styles and custom variables that are used throughout the project. It sets up the base styles for the body, links, buttons, and other elements, and defines color variables for consistent theming.
relationships: This file is likely imported into the main entry point of the project to apply global styles.
The custom variables and classes defined here are used in other SCSS or CSS files within the project.
Tailwind CSS directives included in this file are processed by the Tailwind CSS build process to generate utility classes used in the project.

identified_relationships.description: main.scss includes Tailwind CSS directives, which are configured in tailwind.config.js.
The styles defined in main.scss are applied to the HTML elements in index.html.
main.scss is likely processed by the build tools configured in vite.config.js.
